column4: I have an amd 64 older 3000+ you recomend x64 version or x86?
there's really no reason not to run x64 in my opinion....
its about 5-10% overalll like he said, some apps can be up to 60% faster
if i were u i'd give ti a shot...the only way ppl are going to move to 64-bit is if they start using it!@!
